Plot: It's James Franco's turn to step in to the celebrity hot seat for the latest installment of The Comedy Central Roast.
Title: Comedy Central Roast of James Franco
Writer: Michael Ferrucci (head writer), Jesse Joyce, Michael Rowe, George Reinblatt, Vanessa Ramos, David Feldman, Ben Hoffman, Benji Aflalo, Kevin Schini, Josh Comers, Tony Hinchcliffe, Bryan Olsen, Seth Rogen, Evan Goldberg, Kyle Hunter, Ariel Shaffir, John Mulaney (additional material by), Joe Wengert (additional material by), Joe Mande (additional material by), Pete Schultz (additional material by), Josh Patten (additional material by), Anthony Jeselnik (additional material by), Sean Clements (additional material by), Dominic Dierkes (additional material by), Guy Endore-Kaiser (additional material by), Ray James (additional material by)
Actors: James Franco, Seth Rogen, Jeffrey Ross, Aziz Ansari
